data.text:
@tasirmans @V4Families @smeurrens @CanHCGhana And we have to pay the price forever?? 😩😩

AVO please #ReleasePPRAccra

Can we as your clients just have a reason to rejoice for once?
We are tired.
@CanadaIsHome2 @V4Families @smeurrens @CanHCGhana They will keep saying how agents were recalled back to Canada when pandemic began and how now they are all short staffed. Itâ€™s never their fault
@shrutbrahmbhatt @smeurrens I had been applied for skilled work as a rope access. NOC B
@Ultimus_vG @CanadaIsHome2 @smeurrens @CanHCGhana @SeanFraserMP Accra VO is not a visa office, staff are there to mark attendance only
@smeurrens Got my Landed Documeny today after waiting almost Four years. Keep the faith guys and hang in there.
@smeurrens Pls can anyone question New Delhi Visa Office as to WHY they are not processing the Quebec Business Class applications ??

@smeurrens Mr. Meurrens, is there any chance to get any insight from how visa offices across Canada arrange workloads to tackle backlog? Our case has been stuck in Winnipeg VO and agents refuse to give us any information, while other VOs seem to be working on cases of the same AOR. EE PNP

@CanadaIsHome2 @smeurrens @CanHCGhana What is happening in Accra VO @CanHCGhana? Despite all promise to clear backlogs, 2019/2020/2021 files are still rotting away in this Visa office. What is happening? @SeanFraserMP! People are still suffering at the hands of Accra VO!

@smeurrens @CanHCGhana cannot even claim Covid19 is an excuse. Restrictions in Accra didn't even last for too long. Resume and finalize files? No... ADRs sent ane addressed swiftly by applicants yet no PPR.
